name: Shooting Champion
description:
Experience the ISSF 2018 Changwon World Shooting Championship in advance.
Air rifle, Clay Target shooting (Skeet)
Olympic shooting event which anyone can enjoy
Become the best shooting champion by competing with users all over the world at a realistic shooting game.
Feel the pleasure of shooting and fun of passing through stages.
Air rifle gold medal
Clay Target Shooting gold medal
Single play
VS Play
Bonus Game
random duel
